verses.text: Now these are the generations of the sons of Noah, Shem, Ham, and Japheth: and unto them were sons born after the flood.

similars.text: These are the families of the sons of Noah, after their generations, in their nations: and by these were the nations divided in the earth after the flood.
And Noah begat three sons, Shem, Ham, and Japheth.
And the sons of Noah, that went forth of the ark, were Shem, and Ham, and Japheth: and Ham is the father of Canaan.
These are the generations of Shem: Shem was an hundred years old, and begat Arphaxad two years after the flood:
Noah, Shem, Ham, and Japheth.
In the selfsame day entered Noah, and Shem, and Ham, and Japheth, the sons of Noah, and Noah's wife, and the three wives of his sons with them, into the ark;
Unto Shem also, the father of all the children of Eber, the brother of Japheth the elder, even to him were children born.
And Noah was five hundred years old: and Noah begat Shem, Ham, and Japheth.

verses.text: And the border of the Canaanites was from Sidon, as thou comest to Gerar, unto Gaza; as thou goest, unto Sodom, and Gomorrah, and Admah, and Zeboim, even unto Lasha.

verses.text: Unto Shem also, the father of all the children of Eber, the brother of Japheth the elder, even to him were children born.

similars.text: Now these are the generations of the sons of Noah, Shem, Ham, and Japheth: and unto them were sons born after the flood.

verses.text: The children of Shem; Elam, and Asshur, and Arphaxad, and Lud, and Aram.

verses.text: And Arphaxad begat Salah; and Salah begat Eber.

verses.text: And unto Eber were born two sons: the name of one was Peleg; for in his days was the earth divided; and his brother's name was Joktan.

verses.text: And their dwelling was from Mesha, as thou goest unto Sephar a mount of the east.
These are the sons of Shem, after their families, after their tongues, in their lands, after their nations.

similars.text: These are the sons of Ham, after their families, after their tongues, in their countries, and in their nations.

verses.text: These are the families of the sons of Noah, after their generations, in their nations: and by these were the nations divided in the earth after the flood.
